reviewText: I use these film with my World Geography classes, and they really enjoy them. They get to see more of what daily life is in these countries, which many travel films don't.
I injoyed  Ion wright as he went on a  awesone  trip that was very adventerous injoyable megan had her half of adventure as well.
I got this for my brother who was in the Pacific in WWII.  He enjoyed revisiting these places.
This video showed Micronesia to be beautiful and available to tourists. The young tour-guides added humor and interest.
